questions.question_text:
A company has determined it does not have the in-house capability to perform a project and wants to procure third-party services.
Which of the following documents will the company MOST likely release FIRST?
questions.answer_description: Reference: Kim Heldman, CompTIA Project+ Study Guide, 2nd Edition, Sybex, Indianapolis, 2017, p. 300

discussion.content:
Request for Information (RFI) An RFI is used when you need to gather more
information about the goods or services you need to procure. This process will give you a
sense for the number of providers or contractors who can provide the goods or services,
and you will get an idea of cost. An RFI or RFQ is used when the costs are unknown to
you and you need an estimate for the goods or services.

C. Hire a translator to help the key team member

The best action for the project manager to take in this scenario would be to hire a translator to help the key team member. This will help ensure that the team member has a clear understanding of the client requirements and can complete their work effectively.
according to the book, hire a translator, find a common language, use translated written word rather than spoken to help prevent misunderstanding

choices.A: Ask the client to provide additional language resources to the team.
choices.C: Hire a translator to help the key team member
choices.D: Ask the client to provide requirements in the native language of the team.

questions.question_text:
A new corporate policy was approved that will positively affect the project.
Which of the following should the project manager do FIRST?

discussion.content: The answer is D all way....unless someone here prove me wrong

Selected Answer: D
A burndown chart or burn-down chart is a graphical representation of work left to do versus time. The outstanding work is often on the vertical axis, with time along the horizontal. Burn-down charts are run charts of outstanding work. It is useful for predicting when all of the work will be completed.
The only chart im aware of that has any relevance to the agile portion of the test is the Burndown chart. Defintely D.
The most common way to display project schedules is a Gantt chart. (CompTia Project + Study guide, 2nd ed.)
